body: Fixes #345. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346)

comment_regular_data.body:
Reviewed 1 of 1 files at r1.
Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion.

---

*[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 2732 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346#-KZQNImkDav-xGt6iqU8:-KZQNImkDav-xGt6iqU9:brf69df) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/233b85fdf2340605fd4d8d1b7dfc482ab8accc6d/toxcore/Messenger.c#L2732)):*
> ```C
>             if (temp.status < 3) {
>                 memcpy(temp.info, m->friendlist[i].info,
>                        MIN(m->friendlist[i].info_size, MIN(SAVED_FRIEND_REQUEST_SIZE, MAX_FRIEND_REQUEST_DATA_SIZE)));
> ```

Why not precalculate `MIN(SAVED_FRIEND_REQUEST_SIZE, MAX_FRIEND_REQUEST_DATA_SIZE)`?
Maybe extract result of `MIN(..MIN())` into separate variable? IMO it will make reading easier.

---


*Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346)*
<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

--- Reviewed 1 of 1 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346#-:-KZQOeHm8LE34rFzHrpS:b-jbsf8z)*

--- Reviewed 1 of 1 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion, all commit checks successful. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 2732 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346#-KZQNImkDav-xGt6iqU8:-KZQQ0LG8VsQ6HHWDoUu:bfuzmds) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/233b85fdf2340605fd4d8d1b7dfc482ab8accc6d/toxcore/Messenger.c#L2732)):* >Why not precalculate MIN(SAVED_FRIEND_REQUEST_SIZE, MAX_FRIEND_REQUEST_DATA_SIZE)? `MIN(SAVED_FRIEND_REQUEST_SIZE, MAX_FRIEND_REQUEST_DATA_SIZE)` should be precalculated by compiler at compile-time, it's a const expression. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346#-:-KZQQEpmbsQzWOEUGIOn:b-jbsf8z)*
@iphydf just curious, what's `aioobe`, the branch name? Array Index Out Off Bounds Error?

--- Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion, all commit checks successful. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 2732 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346#-KZQNImkDav-xGt6iqU8:-KZQ_U2v1S_Sn3K3d1e2:bbbvu4w) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/233b85fdf2340605fd4d8d1b7dfc482ab8accc6d/toxcore/Messenger.c#L2732)):*
Previously, nurupo wrote…
>Why not precalculate MIN(SAVED_FRIEND_REQUEST_SIZE, MAX_FRIEND_REQUEST_DATA_SIZE)? `MIN(SAVED_FRIEND_REQUEST_SIZE, MAX_FRIEND_REQUEST_DATA_SIZE)` should be precalculated by compiler at compile-time, it's a const expression.
Thanks for explanation --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346#-:-KZQ_f-oP74Knqd5I0Qe:b-jbsf8z)*

Yes: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.html. There was no exception in C, and ASAN can't catch it, but in Java there would have been an AIOOBE. --- Review status: 0 of 1 files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion, some commit checks failed. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 2732 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346#-KZQNImkDav-xGt6iqU8:-KZRX7ydFPQETz514YNO:b-19ocb3) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/233b85fdf2340605fd4d8d1b7dfc482ab8accc6d/toxcore/Messenger.c#L2732)):*
Previously, Diadlo (Polshakov Dmitry) wrote…
Thanks for explanation
Moved it to a variable. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/346#-:-KZRWqCJZJDKoMRdWTOf:bk5ursc)*

commit.message:
Avoid array out of bounds read in friend saving.

Fixes #345.
